name: presentationController(_:willPresentWithAdaptiveStyle:transitionCoordinator:)
desc: Notifies the delegate that an adaptivity-related transition is about to occur.
declaration:
optional func presentationController(_ presentationController: UIPresentationController, 
        willPresentWithAdaptiveStyle style: UIModalPresentationStyle, 
               transitionCoordinator: UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinator?)
